nodes.text: Return of the Jedi: Han Solo's Rescue
Return of the Jedi Han Solo's Rescue Pop-Up Book is a young reader book published by Random House in 1983.
This short book depicts six major scenes from the Han Solo's rescue from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, each scene featuring one pop-up. All takes place on Tatooine.
1. The arrival of disguised Princess Leia and Chewbacca at Jabba the Hutt's palace. (The Princess and the Wookiee as the pop-up.)
2. Princess Leia releases Han Solo. (Leia and Han as the pop-up.)
3. Conversation between Luke Skywalker and Jabba the Hutt. (Luke as the pop-up.)
4. Luke Skywalker fighting the Rancor. (Luke and the Rancor as the pop-up.)
5. At the Sarlacc pit. (The Sarlacc as the pop-up.)
6. Luke fights Jabbas's guards. (Luke with a lightsaber as the pop-up.)
